description:
Escavalier, known as the Cavalry Pok√©mon, resembles a bug with various knight and jousting gear. Bravely facing their opponents, they fly around at high speed, striking with their pointed spears. By wearing the shell covering of a Shelmet, the steel armor protects their whole body.
It evolves from Karrablast when traded for a Shelmet.
name: Chevargo
